eds.visualize module¶

eds.visualize.plot_binary_feature_distribution(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, feature: str, class_name: str, hist=False)¶

Plots 2 distributions of a feature: class_name or not class_name This helps us to see where the difference in distributions

dfpd.DataFrame

pandas DataFrame to

featurestr

String of feature’s column name to plot.

class_namestr

String of class’s column name to plot.

histbool, optional

Whether to plot a histogram, by default False Otherwise, plots the KDE.

eds.visualize.plot_feature_importances(X, y, col_names, classify=True)¶
eds.visualize.plot_hist_distribution(df: pandas.core.series.Series, col: str) → None¶

Plots a histogram of the column’s distribution

dfpd.Series

pandas DataFrame to extract column from

colstr

string that represents column

eds.visualize.plot_relationship(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, feature1: str, feature2: str, fit_line=True) → None¶

Plots the relationship of 2 features to each other

dfpd.DataFrame

pandas DataFrame where features are contained

feature1str

feature 1’s column name

feature2str

feature 2’s column name

fit_linebool, optional

Whether to also plot a fitted line, by default True
